game.name: Midnight Scenes: Among Graves
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: When the graves stop whispering in your ear, it’s time for you to surrender to eternal silence. So says the Agreement, and so it must be fulfilled. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: When the graves stop whispering in your ear, it’s time for you to surrender to eternal silence. So says the Agreement, and so it must be fulfilled. Welcome to a new dimension of horror. Welcome to Midnight Scenes.
